name: Acid - Purple Juggernaut - Krush
additionalNotes: Acid Purple Juggernauts, hand-rolled premium cigars are bound with a US Connecticut shade wrapper, infused with the right essential oils, herbs, and botanicals with the finest long filler Nicaraguan tobaccos. Every Acid Purple Juggernaut is expertly cured and stored in oak casks for 150 days to acquire a more complex flavor.
